title: July 2018 Android Security Bulletin Partner Preview

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In read and related functions of Binder.cpp, there is a possible out-of-bounds read due to an insecure default value. This could lead to local information disclosure in the system server with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to sort stored objects in Binder to avoid the improper read.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In several functions of voice_svc.c, there are use after frees due to insufficient locking.  This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add locking.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ArrayConcatVisitor of builtins-array.cc, there is a possible type confusion due to improper input validation. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to correctly check the input type.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In msm_ois_config of msm_ois.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add additional checks when sending VIDIOC_MSM_OIS_CFG.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In libGLESv2_adreno.so, there is a likely out of bounds write.  This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to prevent the crash.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In numerous functions in adsprpc.c, adsprpc_compat.c, and dsprpc_shared.h, there are incorrect types and missing checks that could lead to integer overflows, causing out of bounds writes.  These could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix types, add arithmetic checks, and add copy_from_user calls to fix these functions.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In __ip_append_data of ip_output.c, there is a possible memory corruption due to improper input validation. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add proper validation.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In driver_override_store and driver_override_show of bus.c, there is a possible double free due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to correct the locking.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In the accessibility service , there is a possible escalation of privilege due to the fact that package names are spoof-able. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to confirm the calling package’s identity.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In msm_adsp_stream_callback_put of msm-qti-pp-config.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In free_cluster_node of lpm-levels-of.c, there is a possible use after free due to deleting a list entry in list_for_each. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to use list_for_each_entry_safe while deleting instead of list_for_each.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In createPhonebookDialogView and createMapDialogView of BluetoothPermissionActivity.java, there is a possible permissions bypass. This could lead to local escalation of privilege due to hiding and bypassing the user's ability to disable access to contacts, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to set default permission and remove newlines and tabs from device name when shown in permission dialog.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In msm_adsp_stream_callback_put of msm-qti-pp-config.c there is an out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check.  This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed.  User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In tcp_v6_syn_recv_sock of tcp_ipv6.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add ipv6 tls proto structs and uses them when attached to ipv6 sockets

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In handle_notification_response of btif_rc.cc, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In handle_app_cur_val_response of dtif_rc.cc, there is a possible stack buffer overflow due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In several places there is a possible bypass of user interaction requirements due to missing permission checks. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add permission check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In buildImageItemsIfPossible of ItemTable.cpp there is a possible out of bounds read of uninitialized data due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a minimum size check for the ImageGrid atom.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In prop2cfg of btif_storage.cc, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add correct bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In smp_data_received of smp_l2c.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read followed by code execution due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In l2cble_process_sig_cmd of l2c_ble.cc, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add a bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In startDevice of AAudioServiceStreamBase.cpp there is a possible out of bounds write due to a use after free. This could lead to local arbitrary code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to avoid the use after free.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In get_futex_key of futex.c, there is a use-after-free due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to simplify and correct locking in futex_get_key.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In f_hidg_read and hidg_disable of f_hid.c, there is a possible use-after-free due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to correct locking in the affected functions.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In sg_remove_scat of scsi/sg.c, there is a possible memory corruption due to an unusual root cause. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to properly handle failures in sg_get_rq_mark.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In futex_requeue of futex.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an integer overflow. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to correctly check for integer overflow.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In arpt_do_table of arp_tables.c, ipt_do_table of ip_tables.c, and ip6t_do_table of ip6_tables.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add appropriate bounds checking.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In CryptoPlugin::decrypt of CryptoPlugin.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to prevent the out of bounds write.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In hns_nic_net_xmit of hns_enet.c, there is a possible use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to prevent the use after free.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In writeInplace of Parcel.cpp, there is a possible information leak across processes, using Binder, due to uninitialized data. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to allow writeInplace to pad the written bytes so they are zeroed out, rather than passing the padded size to the function (resulting in them not being zeroed out).

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In BnCameraService::onTransact of CameraService.cpp, there is a possible information disclosure due to uninitialized data. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add initialization.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In mdss_mdp_rotator_play and mdss_mdp_rotator_unset of mdss_mdp_rotator.c, there is a possible use after free due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add locking around the shared data structure.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wmitlv_check_and_pad_tlvs of wmi_tlv_helper.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In several functions of wlan_scan_utils_api.c, there are possible out of bounds writes due to missing bounds checks. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add length checks on ie_len to prevent the out of bounds writes.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In __wlan_hdd_cfg80211_vendor_scan of wlan_hdd_scan.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an integer overflow. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to change the data types from 8 bit ints to 32 bit ints, preventing the overflow.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In __ns_get_path of nsfs.c, there is a possible escalation of privilege due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to mark the dentry with DCACHE_RCUACCESS so that a parallel call to __d_free() will not free it.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In dbglog_print_raw_data of dbglog_host.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks and additional checks to prevent an integer overflow.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In audio_output_latency_dbgfs_read and audio_input_latency_dbgfs_read of q6asm.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege if a privileged process reads from these debugFS nodes with a buffer that's too small, with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In wma_apfind_evt_handler of wma.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds checks.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In ihevcd_parse_slice_header of ihevcd_parse_slice_header.c there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to avoid the out of bounds read.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In OSUInfo of OSUInfo.java, there is a possible escalation of privilege due to improper input validation. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to fix a mismatch between createFromParcel and writeToParcel.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In store_int_with_restart of mce.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add mutexes and prevent the race condition.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In analyzeAxes of FontUtils.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to check error conditions in analyzeAxes.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In removeUnsynchronization of ID3.cpp there is a possible resource exhaustion due to improper input validation. This could lead to denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to avoid resource exhaustion.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In several parts of the WLAN stack, during the WPA2 4-way handshake, there is a remote bypass of user interaction requirements due to improperly used crypto. This could lead to remote bypass of user interaction requirements with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to propagate the KeyRSC field from the MAC to the WMA module and further down in the stack.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In gattServerSendResponseNative of com_android_bluetooth_gatt.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds stack write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with User execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to add bounds check.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In  RsaKeyPairGenerator::getNumberOfIterations of RSAKeyPairGenerator.java, an incorrect implementation could cause weak RSA key pairs being generated. This could lead to crypto vulnerability with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to correctly implement the key generation according to FIPS standard.

vulnerabilities.tech_details: In decrypt of ClearKeyCasPlugin.cpp there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote arbitrary code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.
vulnerabilities.fix_details: The fix is designed to avoid the out of bounds write.
